title: I always end up being friends with my monsters from my nightmares. It happened since I was little so I never really had actual nightmares. What does it mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you feel no fear in your dreams or upon waking up after dreaming of monsters, you should try to discover your soul. You may have a particular role to play in this world. Only your soul can show you your true purpose.
